div.h2: HSPC Blood Pressure Measurement Method/Device Value Set

div.p: A set of codes that describe the method or device used to measure a systolic blood pressure.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/fpar/CodeSystem/bpmeasmethoddevice defines the following codes:

tr.td: A blood pressure cuff that is sized to use on pediatric paitents
A blood pressure cuff designed to be used on an individual's thigh
A blood pressure cuff that is sized to use on an adult upper arm
A blood pressure cuff designed to be used on an individual's ankle
